title: Antietam National Battlefield: People
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People               People        George B. McClellan was the commander of the Army of the Potomac at Antietam.   Robert E. Lee commanded the Army of Northern Virginia at Antietam.   One of the great heroes at Antietam was Clara Barton.   During the twelve hours of combat at Antietam, six generals were killed.   Many of the citizens who lived in and around the battlefield were members of the Brethren or Dunker Church.   You can find our more about researching your Civil War ancestors on this page.
